about_the_game:
Usually when you wake up in your live/work cubicle to the soothing sounds of guided meditations, everything is great. Your console is ready, your food pellets taste fresh, your bean bag chair is plump. You’re ready for the first day of your unpaid internship. But today something feels wrong. The guided meditation doesn’t feel the same when you’re receiving urgent messages warning you not to listen to it. The first day of your unpaid internship feels less exciting when you’re reminded that it’s been the first day, every day, for years now. Are your food pellets even that fresh? Is your bean chair even that plump? It might be time to wake up from this capitalist fever dream disguised as a corporate wellness meditation.

Dive deep into the lore of the company you work for: Tough Guy Mountain, the company that turned the entire world into a marketing campaign to fulfill its sinister goals. Discover how the company started, how it ended(?), and why you’re still stuck here!

Internity VR is a unique visual novel experience in virtual reality that combines absurd humor and trippy visuals to tell a story about you, an intern.

Story rich - A bizarre mix of on-rails VR and player choice heavy dialogue gives the player all the freedom- and all the internment- an intern could ask for.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Internity Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card (integrated or dedicated with min 512MB memory)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR with motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
